data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "What are the advantages of communicating with a friend by sending a text message rather than calling?"
data.answer: One of the advantages of communicating with a friend by sending a text message rather than calling is that sending a text message is quick and immediate. Texting is virtually instantaneous. You type in your message, send it, and most of the time the recipient receives the message within seconds. Writing and sending often takes less time than emailing, and there's much less danger of getting embroiled in a long conversation like what can happen with a phone call.
